key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.CharsPerInch
key.description: Defines the printer font. Valid values are 10, 12, 15, 17 or 20

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.Encoding
key.description: This property defaults to the current platform encoding, but should be adjusted when using one of the printer specific command sets, as these command sets don't support all encodings.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.LinesPerInch
key.description: Defines the printer font. Valid values are 6 or 10

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.RawEncoding
key.description: Defines the encoding for the init string. This defaults to "Raw" to disable the conversion.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.RawInitSequence
key.description: Defines an init string for the plain text output target. This string will be sent to the printer as is, without any translation applied.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.UseEpsonMasterSelect
key.description: Defines, whether a single command (the master select) or a series of separate commands is used to define the font style on epson printers. Enabling this property may improve the printing speed.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.pageable.plaintext.epson.PrinterType
key.description: Defines the Epson printer model. The models are defined in the 'epson-printerspecs.properties' file and define how java encodings are mapped into printer specific control sequences.
